wikipedia_page.main: John Michael Wright (born 25 September 1946) is an English former professional footballer who made 282 appearances in the Football League playing as a right back for Aston Villa. Wright started his career at Ellesmere Port Grammar School and Ellesmere Port F.C. His career was cut short when he had to retire through injury.

response: * Mick Wright (born 1946 in Ellesmere Port) an English former professional footballer who made 282 appearances for Aston Villa
*Mick Wright (footballer, born 1946), English football right back with Aston Villa
